title: Grab an Amazon Echo Show 5 for just $45 right now
content:
Amazon pioneered the smart display product category with the original Echo Show, and there have been several new models since then (in varying sizes and shapes). The original Echo Show 5 was released in mid-2019 as a more compact smart display, with an upgraded second-gen model arriving last year. Now you can get the second-gen

The post Grab an Amazon Echo Show 5 for just $45 right now appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Amazon Echo Show 5 smart display is back on sale for $45, matching the previous all-time low price.
